hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: Gateway
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: Gateway som konfigurasjon skal deployes til

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: Environment
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: Milj√∏ som gatewayen skal deployes til

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: Debug
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Set the loglevel to debug for maven

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
echo "Getting deployer-pom version: ${DeployerPomVersion}."
wget -O tempFolder.jar http://maven.adeo.no/nexus/service/local/repositories/m2internal/content/no/nav/maven/support/${Gateway}-deployer-pom/${DeployerPomVersion}/${Gateway}-deployer-pom-${DeployerPomVersion}.jar
unzip -p tempFolder.jar deploy.xml > pom.xml
EnvironmentClass=${Environment:0:1}
#Check if deploy is done with a proxy with MQ. if [ $Gateway = "sikkerhetslytter" ] || [ $Gateway = "sdp-gw" ] then #Set node to the instance number if [[ $DataPowerInstance =~ "-12." ]] then Node=2 else Node=1 fi fi #get the username/deployedBy wget -O build-info.xml -nv --no-proxy "${BUILD_URL}/api/xml" deployedBy="$(grep -o -P '(?<=<userName>).*(?=<\/userName>)' build-info.xml)"
if [ "${Debug}" == "true" ] then mvn3 clean install -e -X -Dgateway-name=${Gateway} -Denvclass=${EnvironmentClass} -Denv=${Environment} -Denvironment-configuration-version=${EnvironmentConfigVersion} -Dnonenvironment-configuration-version=${NonenvironmentConfigVersion} -Ddeployer-pom-version=${DeployerPomVersion} -Ddatapower.baseurl=${DataPowerInstance} -Dnode=${Node} -DdeployedBy="$deployedBy"
else mvn3 clean install -e -U -Dgateway-name=${Gateway} -Denvclass=${EnvironmentClass} -Denv=${Environment} -Denvironment-configuration-version=${EnvironmentConfigVersion} -Dnonenvironment-configuration-version=${NonenvironmentConfigVersion} -Ddeployer-pom-version=${DeployerPomVersion} -Ddatapower.baseurl=${DataPowerInstance} -Dnode=${Node} -DdeployedBy="$deployedBy" fi
echo "Datapower bygget med:" echo " Gateway: ${Gateway}" echo " Kodebase: ${DeilveryVerision}" echo " Env: ${Environment}" echo " Env-class: ${EnvironmentClass}" echo " DP-env: ${EnvironmentConfigVersion}" echo " DP-non-env: ${NonenvironmentConfigVersion}" echo " DP-pom: ${DeployerPomVersion}" echo " Boks: ${DataPowerInstance}" echo " Node: ${Node}"
